bwwExcerpt: ...the production's hopes of updating one of Broadway's more maligned hits - and justifying its popularity - seems to have floated up to the Heaviside Layer that these cats so desperately crave. This revival provokes but one response to the show's onetime tagline: now and whatever.

keyPhrases.quote: This revival provokes but one response to the show's onetime tagline: now and whatever.
